Blog.post: mani ppl told me dat i hv changed... a lot n its 4 the worse... i think so too... i hv been gg out almost everyday n cuming back home veri late... i dunno y i behave liddat but i juz dun feel lyk gg home n staring at the four walls since i cant concentrate on my work... den i feel dat since i cant do my work might as well go out instead of being alone n let all the memories flood me... den ltr u sms me... made me a bit.... den i dunno wat to reply u den veri irritated.... den ltr i ap the teacher... i couldn help it... she was so boring n irritating... now i noe dat its wrong... cant be so bad... ppl told me dat it was better to remain silent n ignore her so dats wat i m gonna do... i hope i can do dat.... bring a bk along i guess... wish me luck.... haha=p

todae started off quite badly cuz i slepy late den woke up 20mins aft the time i was supposed to wake up den a bit late 4 trng... haiz...den during trng i tried to do smthg which didn succeed at all.... so i felt quite... how shld i put it??? useless?? i dunno... aniwae ltr i went to 85 wif linz, vianz, liaz, pui yee, grazz n kang li dey all... den while we were eating... pui yee moved her things den my phone dropped... not dat i realli care abt my phone since it alreadi dropped so mani times buden the chain which was tied to it oso drop den brk off den fly 1 metre away... den now i lyk veri not used to my phone not making ani sounds wheni move it arnd... sickening... maybe i shld quickly go n buy another one bahz... aft dat when to tm wif vianz n linz den saw tingz den all go to the arcade together... den vianz go n plae para para den she 1st tym plae den a bit funni buden stiu managed to clear all the stages... haha... now i feel so empty w/o the chain... i dunno wat to do... lyk its not my phone animore buden i feel lyk its better not to put it back... haiz... i dunno lahz... juz keep it now... for the time being....

haiz... todae i chiong the 2.4km n didn stop cuz i oso wanted to vent my frustrations.. i decided to tok abt everything i feel in this blog n i dun giv a damn abt wat the others think... i dun care... so whether u like it or not i m stiu gonna write abt it...i think i ren enough le... its tym to let it out... dun keep it inside animore... it will harm me... dunno wat to do now cuz i didn bring my chi back den cant study 4 the test so gonna go to sch tomoro n take... now my thighs n my back SO DAMN PAIN lor... cuz of the standing broad jump n sit ups lor... hiz den todae run liao now walk down the steps so pain lor... dunno tomoro can run or not...haiz... but i will definitely be gg back to sch 2moro den now my hand oso pain cuz todae oso bowl den maebe grip the ball too hard bahz... aniwae i dun noe.... den my d&t onli do 10 slides lor... dats including the cover pg... haiz... dunno if professor snape will accept or not... dun wanna do it again... everydae pia cum to bedok n do cuz cannot do in my hse.... got banned frm my com... so sian... haiz... juz cross my fingers man!!! hope he will at least giv it a passing mark... den i happi liao... not dat i care much 4 d&t aniwae... not gonna take it nxt yr aniwae... dun care dat much abt dat sub... others r SO MUCH MORE IMPT than dat... so sianded todae like dat den suan class outing liao... not dat its bad la... dun be sad hor liaz.. haha... i juz tot dat class outing would be more... i dunno la.... aniwae... gtg le... mum calling...see i guai kia... haha... 2moro stiu gg to training dunno can run or not... see how la tomoro... hahaz... buaiz bloggie

you: i realli dun noe how to reply yr msgs so i didn... i hope u dun blame me... i cant cope wif all the probs now so i m juz trying to solve my other probs... abt us i onli can try my best to push it to the back of my mind n cum back to it ltr...sorri= on fri i becum a bit lawless in the poodle lesson den gt to fa zhan again..the 2nd dae in a row... haiz... ltr when i go training dat tym den lingz told me dat i changed a lot...becum naughtier liao... i hv to tell u dis... i didn mean to be so ap to dat teacher one buden i hv my reasons... realli... i promise u dat i will go back to wat i was n den study hard 4 my tests but i realli hv my reasons to behave the way i did the last few daes... haiz.. dun tok abt it le... aniwae todae was our 2.4km run den i told myself dat i won stop no matter wat happens if not i will regret 4 the rest of my life... den when i started to run... both of my shoelace came out during the station 3 dere...den i was lyk..shit! wat to do now...i dun wan to stop... den my motivation pushed me along n i made it all the way wif both my laces out...haha=p i was so glad i could do it without stopping... den i saw my position...32 den i was thinking... not good la buden gt improve frm last yr den i happi liao... den ltr pam cum n pour water on me den i pour her back den dunno y so mani ppl started to plae water... its lyk veri luan n ver very WET lor... my whole shirt was soaking!!! luckily i brought clothes den can change.... aft dat went to mac n eat den we all went to bowling... its lyk wat the!!! liaz gt strike strike den spare or dunno wat the hell la... wah lao...damn pro lor...but i more pro... haha i gt the ball in the best place..the drain...haha den ltr i go see her score it was lyk onli twice of mine la... buden cannot blame me.. i beginer mah so not my fault... aft dat i went wif pam n tianz to watch sisters den when the face came out dat tym i never see den stupid tianz cum n scare me... wah lao.. den so pai seh lor... stupid ger.. den sumore lauf until so loud... buden the storyline is realli realli stupid..so dun go n watch... it suxs lor...

shit la... dunno wats happening to me nowadaes.. lyk one dae happi one dae sad lyk dat one...mood swing veri veri kua zhang one... den todae the stupid ap teacher still cum n make me when i so high... wah lao...feel lyk bashing her up man!!! so ap lor...she tink onli she can ap meh??? i oso can lor...wif her i shui shi feng pei leh...den oso gt so mani ppl pei wo yi qi ap her... i tell u lor... she is so dumb... me n tianz left her stupid class early she oso dun noe lor... how stupid can anione get la...den so mani ppl use hp in front of her she oso dun noe...the whole klass not listening to her she oso can still keep on continuing to tok leh.... realli veri bu shuang her lor... wats her damn it prob lar... take my name lar... i dun care lor... u alreadi took it twice n u r welcome to take it again if u lyk... so sianded by her lor... den ltr gt the SC investiture thingy den when call jy name dat tym our whole klass was screaming esp TIANZ cuz we onli hv 1 SC n i m proud to sae dat... haha... 2G will is not a goody class n will never be.. not eva... den 2moro stiu gt wat hist test... so sian...hist of s'pore... den gt to pia n read lyk siao cuz dunno wat mr smith was toking abt in all his lessons... haiz... sumore fri gt to run 2.4 lor... den i dunno how long never train liao lor... juz a bit of running den got to go 4 2.4 alreadi... i juz hope i will improve frm last yr position la... aft dat maebe atiu gg to escape but dunno hv the money or not... see 1st la... aniwae gtg... n pia the test... cya bloggie=)

Dedications: you: i m sorry dat i didn reply u cuz i realli dun noe how to reply u n i wan u to noe dat i dun wan dis to happen too n i stiu fell dat u shld do wat i told u... dun continue dis cuz u will make yr life worse.. sorry= bernice: sorry... i didn mean it... but its lyk alwaes when i m tired of doing things 4 ppl den u ask me help u... sorri but i dunno how cum will alwaes lyk dat... i noe u r not pleased wif me 4 wat i did... sorri.. realli... i stiu realli wan us to be very very good frenz... i hope u won take it to heart... lots of ppl esp tianz: i tink i brought yr moods down cuz of my probs, i didn mean it but i juz cant help it.. i realli appreciate the way all of u all r trying to cheer me up and i m very very grateful... i will try to do wat u all advise me to... realli.... trust me but i tink i need time...

dis morn was a veri confused one... when i received yr sms... hmmm... how shld i put it??? at a loss?? so, i didn reply... i dun noe how to reply oso aniwae.. art dat in chi lesson we had to go n take class pic den it was lyk so funni lor... the informal pic dat tym everyone lyk crowd here n dere den so luan but we had a happi tym aniwae den ltr i got high wif hui min n bernice in the music lesson.. den its lyk ms lee go n play the moments of magic den dere gt 3 singers so the 3 of us each person play one ger... den watever dey do in the song we hv to copy den since the both of dem do den i oso do lor... den ltr hui min hu was playing fann wong had to lyk put both her hands behind her back den dance den hui min do until so funni lor...wah lao... cant stand it lor... den the 3 of us juz let the class lauf at our "BEAUTIFUL IMITATION"... aft dat gt lessons den same as alwaes didn noe wat mr smith was toking abt so ended up writing notes wif yingz n tianz.... ltr me n tianz pia go to the stadium to watch our sch match... den when we gt dere the match alreadi start buden we were leading... haha... den started cheering 4 them den we juz lead all the way lor... the score was lyk 60 smthg to 20 smthg at the end so it was a bit of thrashing game... haha... we lyk a bit easy get the gold huh buden cannot be too arrogant... so now waiting 4 the nationals n den gt to go n study 4 the hist test so now muz go liao... buaiz=p

dunno y i so angry... maybe is cuz i bu shuang the poodle bahz... i dun realli noe lar... aniwae i dun wan to tok abt dis .... dis morn it was lyk wow!!! Chicken,hui min, yingz, tianz, liaz n sek all came to write on my hand lyk my hand was the paper den dey juz doodle ALL OVER IT... haha.. when dey finish playing dat tym i look realli lyk a gangster wif tattoos on my hand... den ltr i remember the poodle cuming in 4 lessons den wan to go wash den ms sia dun let me... dunno y... i tink ms sia todae xing qing bu hao or smthg lor... wah lao... keep scolding me.... haiz... den my mood a bit drop... den ltr we go watch th guys play street soccer den dey so CLEVER... go call demselves the "LOSERS" buden we stiu so gd n cheered dem on lyk siao.... luckily he jun go in one ball den we win the 1st quarter or smthg... when other ppl play den tianz keep shouting shen zhong jia you den lyk very noisy n useless cuz every1 oso ah wat... den i pei her yi qi lame den the both of us started to shout AH u can do it... haha... 2moro we gonna take class pic den muz wear neat neat... so mah huan... den my d&t stiu gt a lot haven do... dnno y now i growing not to lyk d7t liao... last tym mr lim lyk beta to us den now lyk wat bernice said "snide"... i totally agree lor... its lyk he is so sarcastic dat he a bit lyk professor snape huh... haha... aniwae..gtg n pia my home wk le... buhbye bloggie...

haiz... very sian. dunno y la buden a bit sad everydae. i noe every1 oso sae dun be sad buden i cant help it...everytime i see us laufing n crapping over dere den i cant help wondering wat would happen if all of u all were gone?? wat would happen to me den.. i noe u all oso dun wan to leave me but face it.... u all r leaving me n nth is gonna change dat fact... i noe i promised u guys dat i hv to be happy for the rest of the years n leave happy memories wif u all n i trying... juz dat sumtimes the barrier to stop me frm being sad juz kinda brk down n lyk disappear in thin air... i dun noe wat to do abt it oso.... haiz... sian... now i oso recovering frm a fight wif my eldest sis hu is so damn unreasonable lor... dun noe y... everytime see my face den muz scold me... u tink i wan to see u ar??? hu ask u be my sis?? u tink i wan it dis way?? I DUN.. not eva... juz dat fate has brought us 2gether as sisters n dere is NTH i can do abt it... aniwae... i hv alreadi given up any hope of us ever being close as most sisters are... TOTALLY... so... aiya... i dun wanna tok animore abt u...

todae went wif tianz to tm to watch mean gers den aft dat dunno do wat den tried caling ppl to cum but dey all lyk busy so we decided to go home n do our homewk... in the end i ended up here blogging... didn wan to do my home wk animore... dunno y nowadaes i dun feel lyk studying animore.. maybe i hv been too affected by u... i dun noe... recently i hv stopped replying ur msg n everything... i dunno y but i juz dun feel lyk pulling yr mood down when i m alreadi lyk dat... sorry...

wat is happening to us??? i realli dunno but haiz.... it is realli damn it irritating lorz...cant stand it anymore...y muz we be dis way???r we meant to be liddat??? if we realli r... i rater we never met b4 den we would never noe each other den all of dis won happen...i dun wan it to be dis way but it seems to me dat dere is realli no solution to our probs..ok...i dunno abt u guys but dats how i feel... i luv u all n treasure u guys so much but now..... ok... i dunno wat u r going thru now but how r we gonna do dat if u dun wanna tell us... when u dun...we dun blame u but do u noe how affected we r by yr moods... u tink dat u juz hide in a corner n try to avoid us u won affect us??? u r wrong man.... so totally WRONG... juz by u hiding in a corner... we will be affected..loads.... maybe u dun noe so i m telling u now.... it juz suxs so much to feel dis way lor..one moment we r so high n the nxt thing u noe... we can juz remain silent n say nth to each other... when dis happens... it is quite obvious lahz...to every1...n den we affect every1 oso... den we wil feel so guilty... i dunno if u do but i noe i do... i dun wanna affect their moods but when the thing juz comes...i hv no choice n den every1 will look lyk ppl in ourning or smthg.... evry1 will get affected lorz.... i realli realli realli realli dun wan dat to happen=(

sOoOo lOoOoOng never blog liao so now chen the art teacher dunno den i cum lorz... haiz... i m so sickened of everything lorz... den juz now type so much den never cum out... sickening com... haiz... i dun wan all the stupid tests n i dun wan us to seperate... i dun wan... i dun even wan us to seperate to other classes n now 4 of u all n maybe more r gonna leave me... haha... dats so funni rite??? how fun is fate man??? itz lyk taking me 4 a toy n tossing me arnd... wat wif u n den u guys n my family... haiz... i tink i had more den my fair share of problems alreadi... i hate it... i hate all my damn it problems...dey all suxs... i noe many of u all hv told me dat ife doesn suxs n itz juz the way i look at things but my pov is dat it suxs n everything juz happily suxs along wif it.... n i juz argued wif my 2nd yest over a veri stupid thing... i dun wanna tok abt it here lahz... sick of it...i dunno wat to do abt it lahz.... juz sickening lorz... sian

haiya... now is the ap kia toking liao... sickening one aft another... sickening.... dunno wat the hell china she toking abt lahz... dun gif a damn too.... but now i m once again flooded wif all my stupid emotions.... out of all of those... i can onli distinguise the luv i wan so much yto gif to u n the hurt i feel in losing the 4 n possibly 5 of u all.... u may noe the way i feel...ya... all dat type of crap but do u understand??? no...u dun... u never put yrself in my shoes n u will never understand the pain of losing 4 of yr most treasured frenz... ya i noe u will be losing a lot of us buden u r not as close to dem as i m to u guys.... when i m joking wif u all... i will tink of the tym when u all will not be here n i will be the onli one of the 5 of us in the sch.... dats so fun rite??? so damn fun.... den when i m hving a cold war or arguing wif u guys i oso will think of the tym when u all will leave me... itz not a very long tym at dat... hey... itz juz lyk 3 more mths frm now.... den sumore u r stiu grounded.... haiz... at dis rate i realli dunno how the hell we r gonna be closer n treasure all the times when we argue or when u r not here... u cant cum out... ya.. u said dere is stiu sch times but do u noe dat most of the times we r very busy doing our homewk or wateva.... i m so sick of all dese... all the stupid tests n the homewk... everything suxs so much...... anyone of u all gt comments on dat plz feel free to tag or comment.... i appreciate it cuz i noe dat dere r stiu a lot more explainations n solutions to all my damn it prob buden i dun hv the patience or the calmness to go n think it out.... haiz...sian... sick of everything lahz... go away... get out of my mind NOW!!! esp u... hurting me so much.... i cant stand it....

so loOOoOong never blog liao so now cum lorz....i m tired of everything happening to me now lahz..... sickened totally.... y does everything hv to happen to me lehz??? den i sumore so long cannot use the damn com den how to fa xie i oso dun noe lorz....sian.... den now dunno y lyk a lot of ppl wan me to go to their church or smthg.... den encourage me to go to their cell grp of church...not dat i mind it but i tink i m not dat ready 4 these type of things lorz...den now oso hv A LOT of the damn it test or dunno wat thing lahz... plain sickening lorz...yuck!!! how the hell do i go n sit 4 the test when i dun even noe wat the teacher is toking abt lahz...juz lyk maths or sci.... dun even noe a bit of wat the teacher is toking abt... den she juz keeps going on and on abt it.....den dun understand hv to go 4 stupid remidial.... YUCK!!!! i dun wan any more stupid tests... i dun wan to seperate frm our class... all i dun wan lorz... but can i help it??? it juz hv to happen...suxs larz... sian of everything... dere is nth i can do abt the damn it fate... it suxs so much lorz... maybe i could destroy it wif the fire or smthg... y cant i JUZ CONTROL IT??? fate suxs so much.... anione gt other opinions plz cum n tell me... maybe i haven tot abt all the alternatives... i dunno but dats how i tink... sian=

so loOong never cum already..den now cum liao almost 4got my username & password...lol...aniwae i went to tm todae den watch catwoman wif tingz yingz tianz n her bro... den itz like super nice lorz...dunno how mani tymes nicer den dat stupid village or dat sisters...dey both rawks as much as mrs goh lorz.... i realli dunno wat to do abt u lahz... making my mind to be as neat as rojak... cant stand it... y is my life dis way??? i may appear to u guys a way but i tink i m a diff person at home....i dunno... i dun realli feel dat happi at home w/o u guys to take my mind off things...den everything in dis damn world sux...juz so much... u all tell me it dun... juz the way i look at things... i dun feel dat way...i juz tink i sux & everything juz sux along wif me...dat is so nice rite??? aiya... gtg... so mani ppl yelling at me...buaiz...dunno how long b4 i m gonna be here

Dis is dedicated to every1 hu has tried to cheer me up, tok to me, help me, advise me or juz be dere 4 me.... ok.. here goes... i dunno y i hv been lykdat 4 the past few wks??? haiz... maybe juz too mani things happening in my life n i dun lyk most of dem... i noe i noe... dun tink too much buden i cant help it... no matter how hard i try or wat i do... it juz doesn happens... i cant juz push it all to the back of my mind n ignore it... mani of u hv offered me advice but i juz cant act to it... u noe smthg??? saying it is easy but doing it is altogether another thing...i dunno wat is happening... i noe i hv changed a lot.... 4 the worse... i m trying to buck up but my target seems to get further n further... i noe a lot of u r giving me yr support but my soul juz seems to get weaker n weaker wif every step i take.... maybe i m juz to weak to help myself... i dunno... one thing i noe.... i m feeling veri veri veri guilty 4 affecting u wif my sadness n watever... dun feel gd troubling u all wif me.... i noe sum of u all hv been quite affected by my moods... i m sorri but i cant control it... maybe u all shld try ignoring me instead??? i dunno but i realli dun wan to trouble u wif all my probs when i noe dat all of u hv too n feel veri pressurised by dem alreadi... i dunno wat i shld do... i dunno how to amend wat i hv done... making all of u sad wif me when i noe dat we shld be happi 4 the rest of the few daes dat we hv left... i noe i shldn hv started a cold war wif u guys but i... dunno y i m so thoughtless... i juz dun think b4 doing things...i m sorri juz so sorri... to the rest i noe dat when i told u abt my probs...yr mood has been broughted down by a lot too.... the things i wish n hope 4 the most in the world is dat dere r no arguments or disputes in our class n we can do everything dat r cuming up... lyk the teacher's dae audition... hope we can get thru it n perform 4 our teachers.... hope dere r more class outings... hope dere is more of everything n most of all i hope dat the 2G's spirit will stay in every1 of our hearts...n lastly i m realli sorri 4 all the troubles dat i hv caused... sorri

haiz...went to sch early but stiu couldn find a chance to tok to u den so tired... went to trng todae n tot it would be very tough buden it turned out to be so slack..... ltr went to parkway wif tianz yingz n liaz... went walking arnd but stiu couldn find my shoe.... den tianz sae go beach road buy shoe den went dere gt lost n hot n tired but stiu couldn find my shoe... since so hot den yingz n me decided to go to bugis instead.... went dere but stiu couldn find my damn it shoe... so shitty lorz.... haiz... dunno how the hell i m gg to buy my shoe lorz.... on the train home it was sOoOoOo crowded den me n yingz were both beside two couples... both of dem lyk trying to make me jealous den hug n hug lorz... hug here hug dere... so qian bian!!! den one pair wear yellow n purple den the other wear lyk national flag lykdat... RED N WHITE!!! aniwae gt down the train earlier den let yingz suffer for 3 more stops.. haha... so poor thing... so now veri bored den gt a ton of hmwk waiting 4 me to do..... so SICKENING!!!!

i dunno y everything has been gg wrong 4 me... it juz suxs lor... 1st dat den the ip den bball den my damn it wallet lost.... i dun get it.. wat did i do wrong to deserve dis??? y does everything juz hv to go wrong at the same tym??? i cant cope wif all dis anymore... it juz suxs... dunno y lykdat one... buden i noe others r oso not dat much better off den me... i noe dey r oso veri troubled n hv a lot of probs but it juz seems to me dat i hv mre den all of dem... i dun understand y life is so full of probs... its juz so sickening... if it doesn giv us probs every1 would be happi n we won tok abt how it is unfair or wateva shit... i juz dun get it... y does it hv to be unfair?? y does life hv to be unfair??? it juz suxs.... if any1 got any comments abt dis stupid life, feel free to tok it out.. can comment or tag... wateva u wan...

todae was a stupid dae man!!! i hate it... i wished it never happened at all... it is ju so sucky... i dun understand y the hell u behave liddat la... juz change w/o any reason at all...den sumore stiu is OUR FAULT... i m sick of trying to find out wat happened to u den ltr ur mood juz take a 180 degree turn w/o us even noeing how the hell it happened... i m so sick of dis happening lor.... cant stand it!!! everytime dis happened, i juz accepted it n took it in my stride but dis tym u hv realli gone too far... not dat i dun treasure our frenship but u hv realli gone beyond my limit.... i dunno wats gonna happen to us animore.... sick of all dis fighting!! y is fate alwaes playing wif me??? i dun understand... dere r so mani ppl on dis earth n u choose to toy wif me so mani times... wat wrong did i do to deserve dis unrelenting merciless truth??? can u plz tell me or at least giv me a clue??? dis is the day i shall alwaes remember: 2/8/04; the day whr so mani things happened to us... i dun hv to mention names... i think u all noe hu u r.... i felt lyk so.... i dunno how to express.... u told me u tried to tok to us but alwaes get rejected... i dare to tell u dat i did not reject u... i dare to say dat i tried to get all of us together to tok but in the end wat did i get??? a black face n a shouting match.... u tink i felt gd??? i didn feel gd when u told me dat dere was nth wrong wif us... the way we were behaving in class... i realli didn feel gd... is our friendship realli so fragile??? i truely didn think so... but now i m begining to wonder.... but in the end... i stiu came to the conclusion dat our frienship is not dat fragile... i hope very very much dat it wouldn be destroyed juz lyk dat... i dun wan it to end juz lyk dat.... when we haven even seperated we had to end it.... its lyk dere r alreadi so little time n dere we r fighting.... i went home alone todae n i found out wat life would be lyk without the both of u... it realli sux... wat could i say apart frm loneliness??? i dunno...juz felt dat feeling drowning me as soon as both of u were gone.... i dun think i could stand sch life w/o the both of u to laugh or cry together wif me... i realli dun think i could... to the rest: sorri if dis stupid thing had affected u all... i m sorri dat it had to happen but it juz did n there is nth i can do abt it... i promise to try n resolve it asap den it wouldn affect the team... i noe all of u all r veri worried abt us n i oso dun wan dis to affect the team so hopefully......
